item.title: HP has launched a new mobile broadband service called DataPass
item.description: HP has introduced new technology designed for business travelers in the Asia Pacific region called HP DataPass. “In today’s constantly connected, fast-moving, and virtual business world, new opportunities are emerging for businesses and individuals,” said Nick Lazaridis, Senior VP, Printing and Personal Systems, and Managing Director of HP Asia Pacific and Japan. “At HP, our focus is on developing innovations that provide the best possible customer experience while creating opportunities for our customers to transition to the New Style of IT.
